4.long: Stem specific density (SSD) or wood density (stem dry mass per stem fresh volume)

11.long: Leaf area per leaf dry mass (specific leaf area, SLA or 1/LMA)

13.long: Leaf carbon (C) content per leaf dry mass

14.long: Leaf nitrogen (N) content per leaf dry mass

15.long: Leaf phosphorus (P) content per leaf dry mass

47.long: Leaf dry mass per leaf fresh mass (leaf dry matter content, LDMC)

50.long: Leaf nitrogen (N) content per leaf area

282.long: Wood vessel element length; stem conduit (vessel and tracheids) element length

1080.long: Root length per root dry mass (specific root length, SRL)

3112.long: Leaf area (in case of compound leaves: leaf, undefined if petiole in- or excluded)

3113.long: Leaf area (in case of compound leaves: leaflet, undefined if petiole is in- or excluded)

3114.long: Leaf area (in case of compound leaves: undefined if leaf or leaflet, undefined if petiole is in- or excluded)

3120.short: Leaf water content per leaf dry mass
3120.long: Leaf water content per leaf dry mass (not saturated)
